content.rendered:
Tuesday, November 26, 2024
Today is an “A” Day

Club Meetings and Information

  • The last day for Picture Re-Take & Make-Ups for students and staff is today, Tuesday, November 26th. Students should go during their scheduled Flex Class. Staff can go anytime between 10:00 -2:00. Location for Re-Take /Make-Up days will be the Auditorium Lobby.
  • The last day for Girl’s 7th and 8th grade modified Basketball tryouts is today, Tuesday 11/26 3pm-5pm in the back gym.
  • Attention 8th grade Québec travelers, roommate forms are due to Madame Murray today, Tuesday, 11/26.
  • Our Winter Donation Drive is taking place now. If you want to donate toiletries like deodorant and toothbrushes we are also taking gently used coats or new hats and gloves. You can donate these items in anyone of the 4 boxes in the school. There is one in every spring.
  • Introduction to bagpiping club will meet on Monday, December 2nd in P222 after dismissal.

Check out the Maple Avenue Club Calendar for club meetings and room information!

As always, BE SAFE, BE RESPECTFUL, BE RESPONSIBLE, BE KIND!

Make it a great day, or not…the choice is yours.
